title: #462 The Warped Tour with Ryan Long
itunes:title: The Warped Tour with Ryan Long
description:
Ryan Long came to the studio to tell me about his days touring with his band The Johnstone's and what it was like playing Warped Tour. 

He's also got a special out now! It's called White Immigrant, cause that's what he is, and you can watch it here!

For More Ari Shaffir: 

Upcoming Shows & Tickets

For More Ryan Long:

Listen to The Boyscast with Ryan Long

Watch Ryan's new special, "White Immigrant" on YouTube!

The Music:

Creedence Clearwater - Travelin Band

The Johnstones - Gone for a Long Time

Rolling Stones - Torn and Frayed

Ramones - Touring

Thanks to 3Chi for sponsoring this episode! Head to 3Chi.com and use promo code "Ari" for 5% off your order.
